titles.title: Medicaid and CHIP Access to Prescription Digital Therapeutics Act
Medicaid and CHIP Access to Prescription Digital Therapeutics Act

A bill to require the Administrator of the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services to provide guidance regarding coverage of prescription digital therapeutics under Medicaid and the State Children's Health Insurance Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Medicaid and CHIP Access to Prescription Digital Therapeutics Act
This bill requires the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services to issue guidance for states on coverage of prescription digital therapeutics (i.e., software applications that are used to prevent, manage, or treat medical conditions) under Medicaid and the Children's Health Insurance Program (CHIP).
